page.title: 09EMERGENCY SERVICES, LINCOLN.
page.content: Lincoln{Fire Station}is manned for{24 hours a day. There are{4 watches}with {16}men on each. There are{37 stations throughout the county with day only men. There are{4000 calls}annually in the whole of Lincolnshire and{1500}in the city. The firemen deal with fires, traffic accidents,flooding and rescue trapped animals. They deal with grass and farm fires,especially stubble. Lincoln {Ambulance Station }has {13 Emergency vehicles and {6 }to take hospital patients who visit daily.The staff of {52,}who work shifts, and {8 }day people deal with about {18 emergency calls,{20-25}urgent,and{170 {-180 }regular attendances for clinic visits daily. The greater number of emergencies are heart condition patients. The fleet covers{1000 miles weekly as far as Humberside in the north and Lincoln City area.
